# WHAT IS THE SMART HOME?
A smart home refers to a regular home, which is equipped with smart devices that allow the home users to control, automate, and monitor different home fittings and devices like lighting, air conditioning, heating, shutters, curtains, media, security, and environment using their mobiles, tablets, and touch screens from anywhere over a WiFi connection.
# WHAT ARE THE BENEFITS OF A SMART HOME?
A smart home enables home devices to interact together for you, to provide high levels of comfort, security, and accessibility in addition to an enjoyable living experience, thus improving your quality of life.

For example, a single tap can turn on/off lights, close or open your curtains, adjust the AC, and so on.All of this depends on your needs and your requirements.

One of the greater benefits of a smart home is that it can significantly save energy by keeping everything automated and accessible. Say you have left your home while your AC is on, you can easily adjust or turn off the AC remotely.

And how can smart home save energy? Are smart homes efficient and worth the money we spend for?

A smart home is a priceless solution for those who are seeking their comfort, peace of mind, and a futuristic lifestyle.

Efficiency is improved by optimizing the usage of all energy consuming fittings and appliances in your home to the optimum level which means no more waste of energy.

Lighting, air conditioning, water heater, shutters and curtains are controlled efficiently to maintain the energy consumption at an optimal level.

Lights could be dimmed to support the natural light maintaining the wellbeing illumination level in the room. Air conditioning could be programmed to turn On or Off and to adjust temperature as per your lifestyle and schedule. Even a water heater can be scheduled as per your daily needs.

# DOES SMART HOME INCREASE PROPERTY VALUE?
Buyers of residential units become more excited and are keen to invest in smart home units. Units which have home automation systems have proven higher chances in the market which facilitate to sell them quickly. The cost of converting your unit to a smart home is negligible compared to the added value you will get for selling your unit as smart home.
# CAN I UPGRADE MY EXISTING HOME TO A SMART HOME?
Yes! Our solutions perfectly suit all types of residential space, whether they are existing or being renovated or under construction. No need to change any fitting, fixtures, infrastructures, wires, or anything else in your home. You can simply upgrade to a smart home within two days and without any mess or modifications with out hassle-free solutions.
# HOW MUCH DOES A SMART HOME SOLUTION COST?
The cost of smart home solutions has become very affordable due to a sharp advancement of technology. Adoption of wireless technology has enabled seamless signal transmission and reducing the cost of wiring infrastructure.

The cost of a smart home solution is tailored to fit your needs and depends on the applications which you aim to control, monitor, and have interact together.

You can start building your smart home for as low as xxxx and upgrade as you require, step by step, until you get all you are satisfied with your home automation.

# CAN I UPGRADE THE INITIALLY SELECTED SMART HOME FEATURES?
Our smart home solution gives you very high flexibility, so you can easily add any extra feature or applications to your system at any time without any modifications.

What are the benefits of selecting your bundles rather than choosing my device?

Our discounted bundles have been tailored to suit different residential units and lifestyles. You also get the flexibility to mix and match between different smart home applications which suit your needs rather than being obliged to adopt specific smart home applications or devices.

# ARE SMART HOMES THE FUTURE?
Smart home solutions are currently becoming an integral part of a future-ready lifestyle. They are becoming essential to efficiently execute daily duties and reduce energy expenses. The latest smart home technologies have adopted advanced technologies and are constantly evolving with new features. This has enabled us to provide affordable and apt solutions for everyone to upgrade their lives for a better today and the coming future.
# HOW DOES A SMART HOME IMPACT OUR HEALTH?
Smart home can provide the perfect atmosphere for all home users in terms of temperatures, humidity, illumination level and natural light which can enhance the mental and emotional health. It can also monitor the home and provide push notifications in case of any hazard, like the level of CO2 in your home, a gas leakage, or a fire hazard.

Seniors can benefit by controlling everything in their homes right down to the comfort of their couch or beds. Smart homes also provide an added layer of security by monitoring your residence. It can also be programmed to grant access to your loved ones and can also be used to keep in touch with them.

# HOW DOES A SMART HOME IMPACT OUR HEALTH?
Our smart home solutions are developed using bank level encryption and security. We have implemented this at all levels, starting from smart devices, the edge gateway, our cloud service and also in our applications. We always ensure that our partners and suppliers monitor and enforce compliance to meet industry standards and security policies such as GDPR.

# DOES A SMART HOME REQUIRE INTERNET?
Our smart home solutions need internet only if you are aiming to control or monitor your home remotely via your mobile or tablet. While the internet is not needed for using the smart home internally and all features could be used without internet access.
# IS A WIRELESS SMART HOME SYSTEM STABLE?
In general, all devices around us are being developed to communicate wirelessly. All main players in the smart home market are adopting to advanced wireless technologies and are introducing wireless products.

Our wireless solution adopts a unique communication protocol called COSS which has been developed by the R&D team of our trusted supplier. It provides a unique system which offers strong reliability, stability, a very long transmission distance, and very high level of security.

# IS YOUR SMART HOME SOLUTION COMPATIBLE WITH ALEXA, GOOGLE HOME, SIRI?
Our solutions are compatible with different virtual home assistants like Google Home, Alexa or Apple Home (SIRI)
